mapper.select: /* [위해요소분석의근거자료 - 인증원으로 보낼 체크 리스트 가져오기] haccp_mgmt.C0001.selectFinalCheckList */ SELECT #{lcnsNo} AS LCNS_NO ,#{companyNm} AS COMPANY_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS CREATE_DATE_FOR_FILE ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DT, '%H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME ,L_CODE AS REC_CODE ,(SELECT L_CODE_NM FROM SHC_REC_MAIN B WHERE B.L_CODE = A.L_CODE) AS REC_NM , 1 AS SEQ ,(select ORG_FILE_NM from SHC_COMM_FILES where FILE_KEY = A.FILE_KEY) AS FILE_NM ,A.RMK FROM SHC_REC_CCP_LIST A WHERE REC_NO = #{recNo}
